prompts: Create a prehistoric Pokemon with sharp claws and a sleek body, suitable for speedy attacks.
Show me a water-type Pokemon resembling a fossil with a fierce appearance and agile movements.
Imagine a bipedal creature with a hardened exoskeleton, perfect for battle in rocky terrains.
Generate a Pokemon that combines ancient features with modern agility, ideal for ambushing prey.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in caves, with a color scheme that blends into its environment.
Give me a creature that embodies both elegance and danger, with sharp appendages for combat.
Make a Pokemon that symbolizes evolution from ancient times, showcasing both speed and strength.

distinctive_features: Prominent head with two large eyes
